attributes.action: Force Lottie Dexter to take a course in Software Engineering
attributes.additional_details:
Force Lottie Dexter to successfully complete a course in Basic Programming or Software Engineering/Development before taking up her prestigious role of Director incharge of the  “Year of Code,”

I think its shocking how someone who is woefully underqualified for the job is leading such a fundemental project.

Further Information here:http://www.slate.com/blogs/future_tense/2014/02/07/the_u_k_s_year_of_code_director_lottie_dexter_doesn_t_know_how_to_code.html
